title: Ritual Coffee Roasters French Press
preparation_steps: Grind 28 grams of coffee to medium-fine consistency
Pre-warm French Press with hot water
Add 28g ground coffee to French Press

brewing_steps.instruction: Start timer and pour 448g hot water evenly over grounds
brewing_steps.audio_script: Start your timer. Pour 448 grams of hot water evenly over the grounds. You have 20 seconds. Fast saturation is key with this finer grind.
brewing_steps.instruction_es: Inicia el cronómetro y vierte 448g de agua caliente uniformemente sobre el café.
brewing_steps.audio_script_es: Inicia el cronómetro. Vierte 448 gramos de agua caliente uniformemente. Tienes 20 segundos. La saturación rápida es clave con esta molienda más fina.

brewing_steps.instruction: Stir gently with bamboo spoon to create even extraction
brewing_steps.short_instruction: Stir with bamboo spoon • Even extraction
brewing_steps.audio_script: Stir gently with a bamboo spoon. You have 25 seconds. This ensures even extraction right from the start.
brewing_steps.instruction_es: Revuelve suavemente con cuchara de bambú para extracción uniforme.
brewing_steps.audio_script_es: Revuelve suavemente con una cuchara de bambú. Tienes 25 segundos. Esto asegura extracción uniforme desde el inicio.

brewing_steps.instruction: Place lid on top, do not press plunger
brewing_steps.audio_script: Place the lid on top to maintain temperature, but do not press yet. Let the coffee extract.
brewing_steps.instruction_es: Coloca la tapa encima, no presiones el émbolo.
brewing_steps.audio_script_es: Coloca la tapa encima para mantener la temperatura, pero no presiones todavía. Deja que el café extraiga.

brewing_steps.audio_script: Wait for 4 minutes and 15 seconds. Ritual's method uses a medium-fine grind for a quicker, more vibrant extraction.
brewing_steps.audio_script_es: Espera 4 minutos 15 segundos. El método de Ritual usa una molienda medio-fina para una extracción más rápida y vibrante.

brewing_steps.instruction: Press plunger down slowly, pour immediately
brewing_steps.audio_script: Press the plunger down slowly. Pour immediately into a warmed mug to enjoy the bright, nuanced flavors.
brewing_steps.instruction_es: Presiona el émbolo lentamente, sirve inmediatamente.
brewing_steps.audio_script_es: Presiona el émbolo hacia abajo lentamente. Sirve inmediatamente en una taza caliente para disfrutar los sabores brillantes y matizados.

what_to_expect.description: Ritual Coffee's French Press method focuses on precision and artistry. The medium-fine grind and shorter extraction time create a bright, nuanced cup while maintaining the characteristic body. Perfect for showcasing single-origin coffees.
what_to_expect.audio_script: Ritual Coffee focuses on precision. Using a medium-fine grind and shorter steep time, this recipe highlights the bright, nuanced flavors of single-origin coffees.
what_to_expect.description_es: El método Ritual es simple y directo. Sin complicaciones, solo café consistente cada vez.
what_to_expect.audio_script_es: Ritual mantiene las cosas simples. Sin pasos complicados, solo un proceso directo que produce café consistente.

notes: Ritual Coffee's French Press method focuses on precision and artistry. The medium-fine grind and shorter extraction time create a bright, nuanced cup while maintaining the characteristic body. Perfect for showcasing single-origin coffees.
notes_es: Método simple y directo de Ritual Coffee Roasters.
preparation_steps_es: Muele 30g de café a molienda gruesa.
